en: The Mid-Autumn Festival is on the fifteenth day of the eighth month in the Chinese calendar.
zh: 中秋節是在農曆八月十五日。

en: It is a time to look at the big round moon.
zh: 這是一個仰望又大又圓的月亮的時刻。

en: This has been a special day in China for a very long time.
zh: 這一天在中國已經是特別的日子很久很久了。

en: Long ago there were ten suns in the sky. It was very hot and people were not happy.
zh: 很久以前，天上曾經有十個太陽，天氣非常炎熱，人們都很痛苦。

en: A brave man named Hou Yi helped them.
zh: 一位名叫后羿的勇士幫助了大家。

en: He went to a tall mountain and shot down nine suns with his strong bow.
zh: 他登上高山，用他強大的弓箭射下了九個太陽。

en: Everyone loved Hou Yi for saving them.
zh: 人們因為后羿拯救了他們，都非常愛戴他。

en: Hou Yi had a wife named Chang’e. She was very beautiful and kind, and they were a happy couple.
zh: 后羿有一位妻子，名叫嫦娥。她非常美麗又善良，他們是一對幸福的夫妻。

en: One day Hou Yi met the Queen Mother of the West, who gave him a special pill.
zh: 一天，后羿出門旅行時，遇到了西王母，西王母送給他一顆靈藥。

en: This pill could make someone immortal.
zh: 這顆仙藥能讓人長生不死。

en: But Hou Yi loved his wife and didn’t want to become immortal without her, so he gave the pill to Chang’e to keep it safe.
zh: 但是后羿非常愛他的妻子，不想自己獨自長生不死，所以他把靈藥交給嫦娥保存。

en: A bad man named Peng Meng found out about the pill and wanted it very much.
zh: 沒想到，一個名叫逢蒙的惡人知道了靈藥的存在，非常想要得到它。

en: When Hou Yi was away, Peng Meng went to their house and forced Chang’e to give him the pill.
zh: 當后羿不在家時，逢蒙闖進他們的家裡，逼迫嫦娥交出靈藥。

en: Chang’e knew she could not fight him, so she quickly swallowed the pill herself.
zh: 嫦娥知道自己無法抵抗，只好立刻把靈藥吞下。

en: After she took the pill, Chang’e felt light and floated up into the sky until she reached the moon.
zh: 吃下靈藥後，嫦娥感覺身子變得輕盈，慢慢飄向天空，最後來到月亮上。

en: Hou Yi was very sad when he found out what happened.
zh: 后羿得知發生的事後，心中十分悲傷。

en: He put out Chang’e’s favorite foods to share with her.
zh: 他把嫦娥最喜歡的食物擺出來，希望能與她分享。

en: The people in the village also put out food and prayed to Chang’e for blessings.
zh: 村裡的人們也紛紛擺上供品，向嫦娥祈求保佑。

en: Now people celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival by looking at the moon and eating mooncakes.
zh: 現在，人們會在中秋節時賞月、吃月餅。

en: The festival is a time for families to be together and share happiness.
zh: 這個節日是一家人團聚、分享快樂的時刻。
